text:
@IlhanMN And on trumps admins. very first coronavirus pandemic emergency response without using experienced health personnel (due to trump eliminating them 2 yrs. ago) they let Pandora open the box and invite it right into the USA.
And then, threatened a whistleblower with termination.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
